notes:
[Rolling Thunder] is the pick. There's been discussion about whether it or [Grip of Desolation] is the best uncommon, but out of this pack there isn't anything remotely close.

The runner up is probably [Roil's Retribution] which I haven't gotten to play with much, which I suspect means other people are taking it higher than I am, but even if it's a little clunky, five damage divided how you choose can really wreck combat for your opponent.
